Posts.Content: annafrederik wrote: Hello ladies. I hope someone can give me some info. I've been on a bisphosphonate for extensive bone mets for five years. No one at my cancer center ever advised that dental work would be an issue after being on this drug and found out on my own a year later about the possible necrosis with extractions. Turns out I need a tooth extracted now and I'm freaking out......anybody out there who has successfully had a tooth pulled without the jaw damage? I don't know what to do....dentist says it has to come out and cancer center says I shouldn't have it removed. Please someone, anyone, tell me they've had a successful extraction. Dx IDC, 3cm, Stage IV, Grade 2, 10/15 nodes, mets, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Osteonecrosis of the jaw annafrederik annafrederik
